Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

A reactor is a light-weight thread dedicated to processing requests and responses (requests with a response value) (beta).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommonReactor
    Implemented by all reactors except IsolationReactor.
    Reactor
    A reactor is a light-weight thread dedicated to processing requests and responses (requests with a response value).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingReactor
    Process requests/responses which may block the thread or tie it up with a long computation.
    Facility
    A reactor parent, facilities are named and registered with Plant.
    IsolationReactor
    Processes each request until completion, processing responses and 1-way messages (e.g.
    NonBlockingReactor
    Process requests/responses quickly and without blocking the thread.
    ReactorBase
    Base class for reactors.
    RegistrationNotification
    Notification that a blade has registered/unregistered.
    SwingBoundReactor
    A reactor which processes requests/responses on the Swing UI thread.
    ThreadBoundReactor
    A reactor bound to a pre-existing thread.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ReactorClosedException
    This exception is thrown when passing a Request to a reactor and that reactor is closed.

Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors Description

A reactor is a light-weight thread dedicated to processing requests and responses (requests with a response value) (beta).

A reactor has an input queue of requests/responses not yet processed and a table of requests/responses to be sent to other reactors.

Related Tutorial Pages

  • Reactors - Lightweight Threads
